location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 3114/46 'Miscellaneous telegrams for onward transmission by I.O.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 22; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file mainly consists of assorted telegrams from Moscow to Kabul regarding matters of communication.
